holidays.title: Dashain
holidays.description: Let us celebrate this time of year when families come together and extend kindness to others.

holidays.title: Global Handwashing Day
holidays.description: It's simple: Wash your hands, save lives.

holidays.title: International Day of Rural Women
holidays.description: Let us celebrate the strength, courage, and triumphs of these superwomen!

holidays.title: International: Dussehra
holidays.description: Immerse yourself in the rich culture of India by attending the Kullu Dussehra in Himachal Pradesh.

holidays.title: Maharaja Agrasen Jayanti
holidays.description: This Maharaja Agrasen Jayanti, follow in the king’s footsteps and participate in social welfare activities.

holidays.title: Mera Chaoren Houba
holidays.description: Mera Chaoren Houba is observed according to the Manipuri lunar calendar, a region in northeast India.

holidays.title: Mother's Day in Malawi
holidays.description: Mothers are selfless, strong, and beautiful. They deserve to be honored and celebrated.

holidays.title: Mysore Dasara
holidays.description: A celebration where divine fervor meets royal splendor!

holidays.title: National Aesthetician Day
holidays.description: It's time we returned a good deed to our beauty experts — the aestheticians!

holidays.title: National Cheese Curd Day
holidays.description: If you’re a total cheese head, then get excited to celebrate National Cheese Curd.

holidays.title: National Grouch Day
holidays.description: We honor the world's favorite grouch, Oscar, from "Sesame Street,"

holidays.title: National HSA Awareness Day
holidays.description: Health is wealth! So it's always important to stay prepared for unplanned emergencies.

holidays.title: ​National I Love Lucy Day
holidays.description: Who doesn’t love this iconic comedy?

holidays.title: National Latino AIDS Awareness Day
holidays.description: In 2015, Latinos accounted for about one quarter of new diagnoses of HIV in the U.S.

holidays.title: National Lemon Bar Day
holidays.description: We're traveling back in time to learn about the sweet history of lemon bars.

holidays.title: National Mushroom Day
holidays.description: Portobello, shiitake, button, truffle — we’re talking mushrooms here.

holidays.title: National Pregnancy and Infant Loss Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Take the opportunity to reflect, honor, and come together over pregnancy and infant loss.

holidays.title: National Riley Day
holidays.description: If you’ve watched Inside Out, you’re familiar with the name Riley. Well, today is her day!

holidays.title: National Roast Pheasant Day
holidays.description: On National Roast Pheasant Day, learn about one of the most popular U.K. birds.

holidays.title: Navratri
holidays.description: Sharada Navrati is an autumnal Hindu holiday, held in honor of the divine feminine: "Devi."

holidays.title: Shine a Light Night
holidays.description: On Shine a Light Night, people spend a night outside to show compassion for the homeless.

holidays.title: Sunday School Teacher Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Celebrate regular people who decide to dedicate their time to teach kids about their faith.

holidays.title: Tunisia: Evacuation Day
holidays.description: This day marks the departure of the last French soldiers from Bizerte in Tunisia.

holidays.title: White Cane Safety Day
holidays.description: The white cane represents the blind’s remarkable achievements and symbolizes their independence.

holidays.title: World Students’ Day
holidays.description: World Students' Day is a time to pay tribute to A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, the "People's President."

holidays.title: World Toy Camera Day
holidays.description: Get ready to click away as we celebrate the simplest type of camera in the world.

holidays.title: Abdul Kalam’s Birthday
holidays.description: He was an aerospace scientist and the 11th president of India — today, we celebrate his legacy.

holidays.title: Audrey’s Birthday
holidays.description: Audrey posts content on her YouTube channel consistently and has built a huge following.

holidays.title: Anthony Joshua’s Birthday
holidays.description: It is impossible to describe Anthony Joshua's career as anything other than a knockout

holidays.title: Billy Unger’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this talented actor who is steadily building a name for himself.

holidays.title: Daniel Gizmo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This creative social media personality is building his career with consistency and hard work.

holidays.title: Doug Hehner’s Birthday
holidays.description: Douglas Hehner is a great example of a good husband and father.

holidays.title: Friedrich Nietzsche’s Birthday
holidays.description: Friedrich Nietzsche's work strongly influenced modern intellectual history. We honor his legacy today!

holidays.title: Ginuwine’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the seductive singer and R.&.B.’s top love interest, Ginuwine.

holidays.title: Jarrod Schulz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Schulz is a reality television star who is best known for his role in “Storage Wars.”

holidays.title: Keyshia Cole’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous singer, songwriter, and T.V. personality has become one of music's most important figures.

holidays.title: Malu Trevejo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer is working hard to achieve the success she's after!

holidays.title: Mesut Özil’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mesut Özil is a talented footballer who has worked on his career since 1995.

holidays.title: Sophia Birlem’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no stopping this witty and ambitious social media personality from building a successful career.

holidays.title: Zelo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Zelo discovered his interest in music and has successfully pursued a career as a singer/rapper.
